title: im  gona kill myself it takes SOOOOOOOO long to lvl up man without xp boost becuse dont have $$$
body: ples fix it fast it is killing me im slowly getting bored of this game

replies.body: What I do is play Co-Op vs. AI to level my account since it gives consistent XP and IP, so long as you win (which typically shouldn't be too hard).
yeah ahha thanks, that takes that problem out but what about ip for people because I don't want to just get the 450 or 1350 people any sugestions ?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I think bots are still a good source of IP. First wins, too!

no its not %%%%
I win a game and gives me 50 xp ... and if I lose I get 20 its gay as fuck and u need 1000 xp for lvl 11 its not fast
But........Its unbelievably easy and fast to level up O.O
